name: devein
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to remove the long, black thread from a prawn (= a small sea creature eaten as food) or similar sea food: Devein the shrimp and place them in a shallow frying pan. De-vein the prawns with a sharp knife by making a cut along the back.
to remove the part that is not eaten in the middle of some vegetables: Devein the chillies and remove the seeds. De-vein the kale, then coarsely chop the leaves.
More examplesFewer examplesDe-vein and clean each langoustine.You need to peel the shells and tails and devein the prawns.Carefully devein the black part of the prawn using a sharp knife.Devein the peppers and chop them coarsely.The leaves were too small to devein.
